About.step1_text: Get to know managers and learn from the customer about the goals and tasks facing the project.
About.step2_text: Analyze the target audience of the project, analyze competitors, build the project structure and create a pilot prototype.
About.step3_text: Draw the design, layout, and assembly of the site or application.
About.step4_text: Check previously built hypotheses, correct selected solutions and correct errors.
About.step5_text: Commissioning of the project, as well as the binding of the necessary services and systems.
About.step6_text: Technical support, as well as regular updating and improvement of the project code.

Optimization.page_title: Optimization of speed applications and websites–≤
